DOC.brief_summary: The investigators aimed to compare two approaches thoracoscopic epicardial ablation and endocardial catheter ablation after failed initial catheter ablation in patients with paroxysmal atrial fibrillation.
DOC.brief_title: Thoracoscopic Versus Endocardial Ablation in Patient With Paroxysmal AF After Failed Initial Endocardial Ablation
DOC.criteria: failed initial catheter ablation paroxysmal atrial fibrillation chronic lung disease body mass index >35 longstanding atrial fibrillation 1 year previous stroke or transient ischemic attack left atrial thrombus left atrial size >65 mm left ventricular ejection fraction <35%
